SEARCH
Package jpacman.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
jpacman.model.Board
public class Board extends Object
Maintain a rectangular board of cells, potentially occupied by guests. After the board has been created, the dimensions cannot be modified anymore. Guests can move around on the board, and keep track of their position on the board.
Version:
$Id: Board.java,v 1.5 2008/02/03 19:43:38 arie Exp $
Author:
Arie van Deursen; Jul 27, 2003

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(int w, int h)
      Create a new board given a width and a height.
      Parameters:
      w - Width of the board
      h - Height of the board

  • Method Details

    • invariant

      protected boolean invariant()
      A board's invariant is simply that both the width and the height are not negative.
      Returns:
      True iff widht and height nonnegative.

    • consistentBoardCellAssociation

      protected boolean consistentBoardCellAssociation()
      Check that each cell has a correct link to this board. This function could be part of the invariant, but checking it each time is considered too expensive, which is why it is offered as a separate function.
      Returns:
      True iff the cell/board association is consistent

    • getCell

      public Cell getCell(int x, int y)
      Return the cell at position (x,y). Precondition: (x,y) falls wihtin the borders of the board. Postcondition: returned cell exists and is not null.
      Parameters:
      x - Horizontal coordinate of the requested cell
      y - Vertical coordinate of the requested cell
      Returns:
      The cell at (x,y).

    • getGuest

      public Guest getGuest(int x, int y)
      Return the guest occupying position (x,y), or null if the cell is emtpy. Precondition: (x,y) falls wihtin the borders of the board.
      Parameters:
      x - Horizontal coordinate of the requested cell
      y - Vertical coordinate of the requested cell
      Returns:
      The guest at (x,y).

    • guestCode

      public char guestCode(int x, int y)
      Return the guest code of the cell at (x,y).
      Parameters:
      x - Horizontal position
      y - Vertical position
      Returns:
      Code representing guest type

    • withinBorders

      public boolean withinBorders(int x, int y)
      Return true iff (x,y) falls within the borders of the board.
      Parameters:
      x - Horizontal coordinate of requested position
      y - Vertical coordinate of requested position.
      Returns:
      True iff (x,y) is on the board.

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Return the width of the board.
      Returns:
      The board's with

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Return the height of the board.
      Returns:
      The board's height.
